title: Import a textfile into the kerning window in FL5
content:
Hey Guys and Girls,

I have an annoying problem. How do I import kerning from a text file into Fontlabs metric window?? I have tried various methods, but either I get only one line at a time, or I should up the arrow and select one line at a time!  
There must be a way where I can see and test the full text?

Thanks for any help!!  
Morten
author: morten

comments.content: Not that i know of. You always get only one line displayed. That means a lot of mouse clicking.

As far as I know it will only display one line at a time in the text area at top, though this often translates to several lines below. I think if you want to test paragraphs of text you will need to generate and print.
